Anyway, I just read, somewhat dumbfounded, his latest column.

It’s about how all of us in business journalism are being sandbagged by those awful people running Exxon Mobil and the other major oil companies, who are busy gouging us while tossing the press their “malarkey” about supply and demand being behind the rise in oil prices.
